components.name: system form title word add
components.description: show the language specific title for the system form to add a new word

components.name: system form hidden back stack
components.description: field that contains the stack for the undo actions

components.name: system form hidden confirm status
components.description: switch on that the form saving needs an extra confirm by the user

components.name: system form field name
components.description: the name field in a form

components.name: system form field description
components.description: the description field in a form

components.name: system form button cancel
components.description: button to cancel the form action and go back to the previous view

components.name: system form button save
components.description: button to save the form field into the database
